options.text: You must be missing your sock!
Hope you don't get eaten by a croc!
You look ready to join a flock!

rhyme_part_2.text: Leave me, jester. I am mourning my birds.

options.text: Why'd you leave the party? Did you get too farty?
Why'd you leave the party? Don't be so dishearty!

explanation.text: I always carry their feathers with me and that blasted cat loves to play with them, so I came in here to hide from it.

options.text: Look at me juggle! I hope you don't want to snuggle!
Catch them if you can! Or else they'll get a tan!
